content: AC-D MD - Metal Deck cutting disc High-performance metal deck cutting disc for gas saws ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-quality abrasive discs engineered to make cutting through metal deck with gas cut-off saws quicker and easier Thanks to its premium grain and bond system, the disc is faster, free-cutting, stronger and more durable Applications Cutting metal deck using gas cut-off saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Metal deck, Metal sheet Tool type: Gas saw Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Metal deck, Metal sheet | Tool type | Gas saw ### ITEMS- 436717 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x20 MD/ST SP - Package Size 10 pc - 436721 - Cutting disc 14x5/32x1 MD/ST SP - Package Size 10 pc
